requests.name: Photo frames (Customisable sizes)
requests.description:
Client is a mother to 7 children, she has been suffering long-term depression and is deemed unfit for employment by the doctor. The husband is the only sole breadwinner in the family, he just changed jobs recently and has an unstable income. Client is currently receiving counseling and emotional support with regard to other psychosocial, and emotional issues e.g parenting, caregiving, and stress management to assist her in coping with the current systemic stressors from various areas. Creating artwork has become a vital outlet for the client, providing a sense of purpose and emotional release amidst her daily challenges. Displaying her work using the donated wooden frames will not only validate her efforts but also enhance her self-esteem, offering a tangible sense of accomplishment. The frames will create a comforting environment where her talents are visible, fostering pride and motivation to continue her creative pursuits. This visibility is crucial for her mental health journey, helping her combat feelings of isolation and worthlessness often associated with long-term depression.

50 cm by 50 cm frame x 4 
40 cm by 40 cm frame x 1 
40cm by 50 cm frame x2
